Registry of Open Data on AWS

Fly Brain Anatomy: FlyLight Gen1 and Split-GAL4 Imagery

biology fluorescence imaging image processing life sciences microscopy neurobiology neuroimaging neuroscience

Description

This data set, made available by Janelia's FlyLight project, consists of fluorescence images of Drosophila melanogaster driver lines, aligned to standard templates, and stored in formats suitable for rapid searching and visualization. Additional data will be added as it is published. A large release of Gen1 MCFO samples is coming at the beginning of May 2020.

Update Frequency

As required

Resources on AWS

  • Description
    Imagery and Metadata
    Resource type
    S3 Bucket
    Amazon Resource Name (ARN)
    arn:aws:s3:::janelia-flylight-imagery
    AWS Region
    us-east-1
    AWS CLI Access (No AWS account required)
    aws s3 ls s3://janelia-flylight-imagery/ --no-sign-request
  • Description
    Alignment Templates
    Resource type
    S3 Bucket
    Amazon Resource Name (ARN)
    arn:aws:s3:::janelia-flylight-templates
    AWS Region
    us-east-1
    AWS CLI Access (No AWS account required)
    aws s3 ls s3://janelia-flylight-templates/ --no-sign-request
  • Description
    Color Depth MIPs
    Resource type
    S3 Bucket
    Amazon Resource Name (ARN)
    arn:aws:s3:::janelia-flylight-color-depth
    AWS Region
    us-east-1
    AWS CLI Access (No AWS account required)
    aws s3 ls s3://janelia-flylight-color-depth/ --no-sign-request
